title: 我进入自己开的服务器就闪退
author: feiliwei
txt_content:
错误日记如下，进入服务器就闪退，不清纯怎么回事。



游戏核心：1.12（原版纯净）
启动内存：2048 MB
操作系统：Microsoft Windows 10 专业版 x64
————————————————————
CPU：#0AMD FX(tm)-8320 Eight-Core Processor 
内存：8091
显卡：#0AMD Radeon R7 200 Series 
————————————————————
核心路径：D:\game\Minecraft\我的世界大整合\.minecraft\versions\1.12（原版纯净）
Java信息：C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_221\bin\javaw.exe (Java1.80 64 Bit)
BakaXL路径：D:\game\Minecraft\我的世界大整合\碎裂空间-空岛启动器.exe
————————————————————
错误日志：
---- Minecraft崩溃报告 ----
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 3/12/20 4:34 PM
崩溃类型： Updating screen events

java.lang.NullPointerException: Updating screen events
        at bli.k(SourceFile:386)
        at bli.q(SourceFile:374)
        at bhz.t(SourceFile:1625)
        at bhz.az(SourceFile:1000)
        at bhz.a(SourceFile:419)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:123)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:
        at bli.k(SourceFile:386)
        at bli.q(SourceFile:374)

-- Affected screen --
Details:
        Screen name: bkw
Stacktrace:
        at bhz.t(SourceFile:1625)
        at bhz.az(SourceFile:1000)
        at bhz.a(SourceFile:419)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:123)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.12
        Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64) version 10.0
        Java Version: 1.8.0_221, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 91378696 bytes (87 MB) / 157184000 bytes (149 MB) up to 2077753344 bytes (1981 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xincgc -Xmx2048M
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        Launched Version: 1.12（原版纯净）
        LWJGL: 2.9.4
        OpenGL: AMD Radeon R7 200 Series GL version 4.5.13474 Compatibility Profile Context 22.19.162.4, ATI Technologies Inc.
        GL Caps: Using GL 1.3 multitexturing.
Using GL 1.3 texture combiners.
Using framebuffer objects because OpenGL 3.0 is supported and separate blending is supported.
Shaders are available because OpenGL 2.1 is supported.
VBOs are available because OpenGL 1.5 is supported.

        Using VBOs: Yes
        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Resource Packs: 
        Current Language: English (US)
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        CPU: 8x AMD FX(tm)-8320 Eight-Core Processor

replies.txt_content: 发一下服务器启动文件

replies.author: 吃土的紫轩
replies.txt_content: 别人启动崩溃吗 不崩溃闪退的话检查自己的mod文件夹

replies.author: weiqichen
replies.txt_content: 试试把内存调低点 一般是1024
